title: MD
biography: Muhsen Saleh Abdullah Ali Al-Ghassani is an Omani professional footballer who plays as a forward for Thai League 1 club Bangkok United and the Oman national team.
aiSummary: Saleh Al-Muhsen is a immunology specialist with an H-index of 54 at King Saud University (Member). Has been published in Science (New York, N.Y.), Science, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
